msbt.message: It was so sweet of you to send me a gift to mark the end of the year! I want to wish you a happy holiday season as well with this present. Isn't it fun exchanging gifts like this? Best wishes for next year!

Your gift was a nice surprise to end my year and help me celebrate the season. I wanted to send to you a little something as well, and wish you the very happiest of holidays. Hope this is something you like!

Ending my year with a thoughtful card and gift from you makes me so happy! I had a little something for you as well, so I'll send it with this. I hope your next year is full of fun times with good friends!

I was feeling a little stressed out here at the year's end, so getting a card from you cheered me up. I was touched that you took the time to reach out, and I wanted to tell you I'm glad we're friends.
Any mail I get from you warms my heart like a nice hot cup of tea. In the coming new year, here's hoping that we'll keep exchanging notes and finding fun ways to spend time together.
With one year coming to an end, I want to treasure every day and hope that the two of us become closer friends in the next year. I hope we can see a lot of each other and have fun together!
